name: Jobbold: A Job Resume Simulator
description:
A demo just to show off what's been made so far for Jobbold, resume building simulator where you not only play as a Kobold, but you also get your dick wet.

It's not much but if I see growing interest on this I'll try to chug out more updates for it. If you pick any options that say "Incomplete" it'll soft lock your game so remember not to do that. 

If you like this project and want to support us to help get it done quicker, I made a quick patreon over here: https://www.patreon.com/lewdcario11
